Posts.Content: I know what you mean. I meant to do it after my first year out then said, maybe I need to wait until that "5" year mark they always talk about. Thanks!
Posts.Title: Triple Negative Breast Cancer Survivor

Posts.Content: I wanted to post a little hope for those out there fighting this battle. I was diagnosed with TNBC in July 2011 and completed all treatment in April 2012. I went through chemo, a lumpectomy and radiation. I remember getting on this board and reading so many negative things about TNBC and told myself that once I knew I had completely beat it, I was going to post something positive. Yes, it is hard, but yes you can beat this cancer. I am happy to report that I am living a normal life. It is so important to remember that "you CAN beat it" and don't ever give up. You got this!!!!
Posts.Title: Triple Negative Breast Cancer Survivor
